snippet: A string of fatal attacks by great white sharks has Australian officials considering removing the "apex predator" from the country's list of protected species. Could shark hunting make a comeback? If so, Australia might need a bigger boat.
abstract: A string of fatal attacks by great white sharks has Australian officials considering removing the "apex predator" from the country's list of protected species. Could shark hunting make a comeback? If so, Australia might need a bigger boat.

headline.main: Should Great White Sharks Remain Protected?
